Anyone else having Voice issues? The Voices in cut scenes does not work. I had to change the channels to 2 or 4 in order for it to work.

*** READ THIS ***

For those of you who can't get voices to work, change the channels used in your audio card from 8 or 6 to 4 or 2. For some reason full sound doesn't work with more than 4 channels. That means you might have to change your audio to Stereo or Quadraphonic under Control Panel Sound configuration.
